comment: * Internal helper for launching dreams to ensure consistency between the * UiModeManagerService system service and the Somnambulator activity. * * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean shouldStartDockApp(Context context, Intent intent)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the specified dock app intent should be started.
     * False if we should dream instead, if appropriate.

methods.name: public static void startDreamWhenDockedIfAppropriate(Context context)
methods.comment:
* Starts a dream when docked if the system has been configured to do so,
     * otherwise does nothing.

methods.name: private static void startDream(Context context, boolean docked)

methodNames: public static boolean shouldStartDockApp(Context context, Intent intent)
private static void startDream(Context context, boolean docked)
